body.name: Logicfox Ergonomic Mesh Office Chair, High Back Desk Chair with 3D Armrests, Adaptive Thoracic Support, 3D Lumbar Support & Adjustable Headrest, Home Swivel Computer Chair with Tilt Function
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 18 hrs 26 mins
features: 【Adaptive Thoracic support】- The ergonomic office chair offers passive adaptive thoracic support pads. Provides balance and support for the upper back, neck and head. Ensuring your comfort throughout your workday.

【Adjustable 3D Armrests & Headrest】- The home desk chair with adjustable 3D armrests allows you to find the perfect height and angle for arms and shoulders. The armrests can adjust back & forth, up & down, and rotate 35. Additionally, The headrest can be adjusted in height and features a rotation function, offering both comfort and support even after you've moved away from your active working position.

【3D Lumbar Support】- The comfortable office chair experiences optimal spinal support with the cotton lumbar cushion, providing maximum comfort. Regardless of different height sizes, the 3D lumbar support ensures adjustable support in various positions, including forward and backward, up and down, and rotational angles.
【Breathable Mesh Back & Breathable Mesh Seat】- To keep you cool, the ergonomic office chair backrest and seat are designed for maximum airflow, woven for strength, and BIFMA tested for durability.

【Premium Quality Assurance & Multi-Surface Casters with Quiet Roll】- To provide greater stability and strength, the mesh office chair comes with a polished heavy-duty aluminum base and a Class-3 gas lift. The multi-surface casters with quiet roll are designed to be used on any surface.

【Easy to Install & 3 Years Warranty】- The computer chair is BIFMA and SGS certified and can hold up to 300 lbs. The mesh office chair provides 3 years of after-sales service. The Logicfox home desk chair can be easily installed within 15 minutes, If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s really comfy and easy to assemble the quality of the materials are also excellent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice chair
reviews.reviewText: I've always had a "gaming" chair but they would always brake after a year or two so i decided to go with this one and wow is all that needs to be said its very comfortable and helps with my posture and was very easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Excellent comfort and adjustability. Assembly a little frustrating.
reviews.reviewText: Took off a star because the first one I tried to put together had an issue where one of the threaded inserts for attaching the armrests ended up coming loose from the plastic and turning, preventing me from tightening it and also preventing me from removing the screw without damaging it.The second one assembled a little easier, but it's still a pain to get the arms on. The tracks for the washers aren't large enough and causes them to tilt which makes inserting the screws difficult.I also had some trouble inserting the casters. Not all of them went in all the way, and still remain further out even after sitting on the chair. Even standing right above the caster on the leg wouldn't cause them to budge.After finally getting it together I was pleasantly surprised with the comfort and adjustability.The armrests can angle in and out as well as slide forward and backward. They can also be raised and lowered. They can be raised quite a bit higher than a lot of other chairs I've used which is great, because I usually find them too low.The headrest can pivot up and down as well as slide up and down. I wish I could slide it back/forward, but it doesn't have this feature. I feel it is a little further back than I'd like.I don't think the seat depth is adjustable but it's perfect for me like it is.The mesh is nice and has a lot of airflow. I have two similar chairs I bought from more expensive name brands and I like this one a little better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best chair for office
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased an office chair that has truly exceeded my expectations. The assembly process was a breeze, with clear instructions and all the necessary tools included. Once assembled, the chair proved to be exceptionally comfortable. The ergonomic design provides great lumbar support, and the added bonus of neck support is a game-changer for long workdays. I can now sit for hours without any discomfort, making this chair a fantastic addition to my workspace.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was a gift to my husband. It is a great quality chair, very comfortable, fast delivery. Highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great adjustment versatility
reviews.reviewText: I like the versatility in adjustment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not Well Documented
reviews.reviewText: For the money this is a great chair... really great... the assembly was not all that difficult (with quite a bit of experience) but required a bit of deductive logic as the types of screws and other hardware in each position are not well documented and one must use the numbers of screws to suggest where to use each size. Once it is together very excellent at this price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars office chair with strong seat-cushion and back support.
reviews.reviewText: I work from home, so I was looking for a good office chair with strong seat-cushion and back support. After viewing a lot of chairs, i choose this one chair. I have been sitting on this chair for about a month now. I like it! I am sitting on it every day for at least 8 hours. It feels really good. The seat-cushion is what i looking for. It seems they made it with a new memory foam. I can tell the difference between this one VS my old one which use the ugly glue-mixed and used material.For the set-up process, I would like to give them a like as well. The Instuction is easy to follow, screws and bolts are precisely fit. I set it up by myself in about 30mis.
